overview: C'mon Hal, Let's Make A Scene. Look out Speilberg, the Undys are headin' for Hollywood. Hal's decided to get a grip on himself and try his hand at directing. Now all he needs is a cast. Problem is, would you want to be in an Undy production? I didn't think so. Keep your eyes peeled then, the Undys are creeping up on you.
title: Married With Hormones 2
